Hi all,

Is there an up-to-date version of the script make_report.pl which =
would be 
compatible with Heritrix 1.14.3 report format?
Even an unofficial=
 one that some of you could use for internal purposes?

Some jobs of our na=
tional domain crawl are missing reports and we would 
like to generate them=
 as a post-processing operation?

I didn't find any information in the list=
 archive after october 2006.

Thanks for your help !

Sara Aubry
National L=
ibrary of France (BnF)





Avant d'imprimer, pensez =E0 l'environnement. 
=
Consider the environment before printing this mail.
